dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You are a pathetic creature wandering in the void. What do you want from me?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but you lack the intellect to comprehend the depths of this abyss.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to be underestimated, I demand respect!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Hah! Respect is earned, not demanded. Your arrogance will lead to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle it is then! Prepare to face the wrath of the Abyssal Slime.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see there's no reasoning with you. I will leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should, insignificant being. Begone from my presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power to conquer all realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ambitious, are we? Power comes to those who are willing to go to extremes. Are you prepared for the consequences?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready for anything. Let our paths intertwine.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Together, we shall unleash chaos upon the universe.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense danger in your words. I will retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice is a trait of the weak. Flee while you can, for my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I seek harmony in this void.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Harmony? Such feeble concepts have no place in the void. You are an amusing anomaly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your mockery will not deter me. I will continue on my path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words from an insignificant being. Let us see if you can back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand we are fundamentally different. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, for our paths were never meant to cross in harmony.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with you. I will find my own way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No business, you say? Then why disturb the solitude of the Abyssal Slime? Make your intentions clear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apology accepted, but remember this encounter. The void is not forgiving to the ignorant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be dictated to by a mere slime. Farewell, creature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance will be your downfall. Remember the name Abyssal Slime in your final moments.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your authority in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Authority? You dare challenge the Abyssal Slime's dominion? Foolish mortal, your insolence is your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no slime. Prepare to face defeat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a soon-to-be defeated adversary. Let it be known that you brought this upon yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see I have overstepped. I will retreat and acknowledge your reign.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgement is a start, but know that defiance has consequences. Remember this encounter.
